com.iciql

Interface SQLDialect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDialectDefault, SQLDialectDerby, SQLDialectH2, SQLDialectHSQL, SQLDialectMSSQL, SQLDialectMySQL, SQLDialectPostgreSQL

    public interface SQLDialect
    This interface defines points where iciql can build different statements depending on the database used.

    • Method Summary

      • getDateTimeClass

        java.lang.Class<? extends java.util.Date> getDateTimeClass()
        Returns the preferred DATETIME class for the database.

        Returns:
        preferred DATETIME class
